item.title: Leaving No One Behind While Multisolving for a Just Recovery
item.description: Photo by Gustavo Fring from Pexels Everyone is worried about the contagion of coronavirus as cases skyrocket. And we should be. Its growth is out of control, and it is killing thousands every day. We can’t afford, however, to let that obscure an equally alarming disease of poverty and homelessness. Just as we all have been forced to shelter in place because of some of us are sick, none of us will be spared from these more structural threats to our health and the long-term future for our planet’s habitability.
